name: obsidian-plugin-ts
description: A modular template for building Obsidian plugins with TypeScript

scripts.build:prod: BUILD=production rollup --config rollup.config.mjs && npm run postbuild
scripts.postbuild: node scripts/generate-manifest.mjs && node scripts/copy-styles.mjs && node scripts/generate-version.mjs
scripts.version: node scripts/version-bump.mjs && git add src/config/manifest.ts versions.json
